Question.Subject: What's the protocol in eBay for an item to be shipped after you won and paid for it?
Question.Content: I recently won an item on eBay. And paid for it within the hour. I was wondering if there is any protocol that dictates that a seller must ship an item within certain hours/days of payment.
Question.ChosenAnswer: The deal is between you and the seller. eBay doesn't step in unless you file a complaint. For example you bought something, waited for a reasonable amount of time, your item never arrived and you couldn't make contact with the seller. eBay assumes a potential buyer will check the sellers feedback before they place a bid. So if your asking if eBay requires a seller to ship within a specified time frame, the answer is no.
